name: bncmet
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)), wcel(c0, ccms))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Ban, c1 ∈(CMet ` c2), c0 ∈ CMetSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CMetSp → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CMetSp → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CMetSp → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CMetSp → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))

comment: The induced metric on Banach space is complete. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
